intro: Psychotria longicornis, commonly known as the longhorn psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil, Colombia, and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and small, clustered white flowers. It grows as an evergreen shrub or small tree, often found in humid, shaded forest environments. The plant contains various alkaloids, some of which have been studied for their potential pharmacological properties.
